title: "AI Has Successfully Imitated Human Evolution—and Might Do It Even Better"
excerpt: "A language model AI created proteins as good as ones honed over a million years of evolution. Salesforce’s ProGen designed sequences based on the “sentences” of biological proteins. Scientists are investigating whether the AI could identify treatment for disorders like rheumatoid arthritis and multiple sclerosis."
